title: I can jump puddles. Ep. 6

Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television serials
description: A 9 part television serial about Australian author Alan Marshall, from his childhood and his diagnosis with Polio to his adulthood as he struggles to become a writer. Based on his three autobiographical novels "I can Jump Puddles", 'This is the Grass" and "How Beautiful are thy Feet". After leaving his previous job, Alan discovers finding work is not as easy as it seems, continually being rejected due to his disability. While his constant walks through the city looking for work, have enabled him to meet a number of people and write their stories, he soon decides to return home and concentrate on his writing.
